title: Recipe for a Plant-Based Sweet Treat, New Volume, and Key Takeaways
paragraphs: Eating a healthy, plant-based diet doesn't mean depriving yourself of sweet treats! Dates are a great whole-food sweetener. Try them in these delicious Oatmeal Cookie Dough Bites. They come together easily in a food processor for a quick and simple sweet snack. Get the free recipe here, and check out our Instagram for a video on how they are made.

According to the renowned Global Burden of Disease Study, high blood pressure is the leading risk factor for death in the world by contributing to various causes of mortality. So, what can we do to keep our blood pressure down? Check out the topic page for a summary and videos like How Not to Die from High Blood Pressure and How to Lower Blood Pressure Naturally.
My new volume of videos is out now. This collection includes an update on bovine leukemia virus and breast cancer, a series on longevity, potassium chloride as a salt substitute, and much more.
Each video in this new volume will be released online over the next few months, available for free, of course, but if you don't want to wait, you can watch all of them by streaming right now.

If you are a $25+ monthly supporter and opted in to our donor rewards, you're likely already an expert on these new topics by now, since you already received a complimentary link to the new download.
